A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The negative audience reviews are proof Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy got it right! The movie is undeniably STAR WARS—not your MEMORY of “star wars” drenched in all of your nostalgic misconceptions and dramatic lost childhood nonsense—just pure STAR WARS. The Last Jedi is intense\, campy\, emotional\, and uplifting all at the right notes. It’s a fitting\, but brutally honest tribute to a character I’ve wanted to be my whole life. Best of all\, the film leaves the universe wide open and ready to grow with my children. I couldn’t ask for more.
